ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for Him who brought me into being, Who will certainly guide me,'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Other than Him who created me. He will show me the right way."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except the One Who created me; and, behold, it is He Who will direct me to the Right Way.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except for the One who has created me and will guide me".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Except Him Who has created me, for He will soon direct me.” (To my place of migration.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except Him Who created me; and verily, He will guide me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Save Him Who created me, for surely He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: except Him who originated me; and He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save Him Who did create me, for He will surely guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [I worship] only Him who created me, and He will certainly guide me,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save Him Who hath created me, and then He would guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: excepting Him who originated me; indeed He will guide me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (I worship) only Him Who made me, and He will certainly guide me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except Him (i.e. I worship none but Allah Alone) Who did create me, and verily, He will guide me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except Him who originated me, for He will guide me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for He who created me, for He will guide me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except for He who created me; and indeed, He will guide me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:27] except Him Who originated, created, me; for He will indeed guide me’, He will show me the way to His religion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 567 Save Him Who did create me) except He Whom I worship, He Who created me, (for He will surely guide me) He will preserve me on His religion and obedience.
